title: Correction to: Long-term fluorescence hyperspectral imaging of on-chip treated co-culture tumour spheroids to follow clonal evolution
content: This is a correction to: Amélie St-Georges-Robillard, Maxime Cahuzac, Benjamin Péant, Hubert Fleury, Muhammad Abdul Lateef, Alexis Ricard, Skye Alexandre Sauriol, Frédéric Leblond, Anne-Marie Mes-Masson, Thomas Gervais, Long-term fluorescence hyperspectral imaging of on-chip treated co-culture tumour spheroids to follow clonal evolution, Integrative Biology, Volume 11, Issue 4, April 2019, Pages 130–141, https://doi.org/10.1093/intbio/zyz012.
